announcements.details: Read the commentary on the readings for the 5th Sunday of Lent.
announcements.title: Commentary: 5th Sunday of Lent

announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 6th April, 2025. Offertory will be led Sunday borns and Sacred Heart of Jesus Confraternity respectively. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: 5th Sunday of Lent

announcements.details: Registration for Easter Sales is ongoing. The date for this year's sale is on Sunday 13th April 2025 which is Palm Sunday. Interested vendors can see the church secretary for more information.
announcements.title: Easter Sales

announcements.details: On Monday, April 21st, 2025, we shall conclude our Easter celebrations with a fun-filled day by celebrating a joint picnic with Epiphany Catholic Church and Corpus Christi. More details will come soon.
announcements.title: Easter Monday Picnic

events.details: Date: 21st April, 2025 | Venue: St Bakhita Catholic Church
events.title: Easter Monday Picnic
